title: Tropical mango cheesecake
ingredients: ['450g cream cheese, softened', '150g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 digestive biscuit base, unbaked', '300ml mango juice, such as Rubicon', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '2 tablespoons cornflour', '325g ripe mangoes, peeled, pitted and diced']
